Landshark

18 HP, 3 Armor, 17 STR, 8 DEX, 8 CHA, bite (d8)

â€¢ Carves through earth as if it were water, using this to lay in ambush for prey. If it fears for its life, a Landshark may cause a cave-in. Falling rocks CHA cause d6 Damage but anyone that stays long enough to be buried takes d10 Damage. The Landshark will have burrowed away before this point.
